6DM1.SG.long_name: Bangkok Dusit Medical Services Public Company Limited
6DM1.SG.summary: Bangkok Dusit Medical Services Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates hospitals in Thailand and internationally. The company owns and manages 6 hospital groups, including Bangkok Hospital Group, Samitivej Hospital Group, BNH Hospital, Phyathai Hospital Group, Paolo Hospital Group, and Royal Hospital Group. It operates regenerative and preventive wellness clinics. In addition, the company operates hotels; distributes cosmetic goods; provides accounting, health insurance, laboratory services, investment, technology and information, training, insurance brokerage, air transportation, and property management services, as well as asset management services; and manufactures, distributes, and retails medicine and pharmaceutical products. It operates 49 hospitals in Thailand and Cambodia. The company was founded in 1969 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

AHC-R.BK.summary: Aikchol Hospital Public Company Limited provides medical and nursing care services under the Aikchol Hospital trademark in Thailand. The company offers hospital services, including diseases protection, medical treatment, health strengthening, and health rehabilitation services with 340 beds in service. It serves primarily individuals, group of policyholders of the insurance company, group of contract parties' company, and group of insured on social security. Aikchol Hospital Public Company Limited was founded in 1978 is headquartered in Chonburi, Thailand.

BCH-R.BK.long_name: Bangkok Chain Hospital Public Company Limited
BCH-R.BK.summary: Bangkok Chain Hospital Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates a chain of hospitals in Thailand. It operates 12 hospital branches and 1 polyclinic. The company also offers tertiary care and diagnosis services; and consulting, operating management, and asset management services, as well as rent properties. Bangkok Chain Hospital Public Company Limited was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

BH-R.BK.summary: Bumrungrad Hospital Public Company Limited owns and operates healthcare-related entities in Thailand, Myanmar, and Mongolia. The company offers diagnostic, therapeutic, and intensive care facilities in a medical center. Its outpatient clinics/centers include allergy, arrhythmia, behavioral health, breast feeding, breast care, children, dental, diabetes, diagnostic, dialysis, digestive disease, emergency, eye, fertility and IVF, health screening, hearing and balance, heart valve, cancer, hyperbaric oxygen therapy, hypertension, joint replacement, liver, memory, men, nephrology, neuroscience, new life healthy aging, orthopedic, Parkinson's disease and movement disorders, perinatal, physical therapy and rehabilitation, plastic surgery, pulmonary, refractive surgery, robotic scoliosis and surgery, skin, sleep lab, spine, sports medicine and lifestyle, surgical, travel medicine, urology, vitalife, and women's, as well as ear, nose, and throat centers. In addition, it is involved in the real estate assets holding activities; provision of clinical research services; distribution of pharmaceutical and medical goods in specialized stores; operation of personnel development and training center for healthcare services; and patient referral service business. The company operates 580 beds and approximately 50 clinics/centers. Bumrungrad Hospital Public Company Limited was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

CHG-R.BK.summary: Chularat Hospital Public Company Limited operates clinics and hospitals in Thailand. The company operates through two segments, Hospital Operations and Other Businesses. It also distributes medical instruments and dietary supplement products. As of December 31, 2019, the company operated 13 branches of clinics and hospitals. Chularat Hospital Public Company Limited was founded in 1986 is based in Samut Prakan, Thailand.

CHG.BK.summary: Chularat Hospital Public Company Limited operates clinics and hospitals in Thailand. The company operates through two segments, Hospital Operations and Other Businesses. It also distributes medical instruments and dietary supplement products. As of December 31, 2019, the company operated 13 branches of clinics and hospitals. Chularat Hospital Public Company Limited was founded in 1986 is based in Samut Prakan, Thailand.

CMR-R.BK.long_name: Chiang Mai Ram Medical Business Public Company Limited
CMR-R.BK.summary: Chiang Mai Ram Medical Business Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates a medical care center in Thailand. It offers medical services in the areas of internal medicine, cardiology, general practice, pediatric, orthopedic and general surgery, pediatric surgery, obstetrics-gynecology, radiology, dentistry, anesthetic, ENT, and eye; and operates sub-specialty clinics for urology, neurology, endocrinology, oncology, hematology, plastic surgery, GI tract, and dermatology, as well as infertile and gynecologic oncology clinics. The company also provides dental, X-ray, CT colonoscopy, cardiac catheterization, gynecologic cancer, back pain, physical therapy and rehabilitation, operating theatre, laboratory examination, real-time PCR, ambulance, and health check-up services; and various insurance products. It operates a medical care center under the Lanna Hospital name. The company was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Chiang Mai, Thailand. Chiang Mai Ram Medical Business Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Vibhavadi Medical Center Public Company Limited.

CMR.BK.long_name: Chiang Mai Ram Medical Business Public Company Limited
CMR.BK.summary: Chiang Mai Ram Medical Business Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates a medical care center in Thailand. Chiang Mai Ram Medical Business Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Vibhavadi Medical Center Public Company Limited.

D-R.BK.summary: Dental Corporation Public Company Limited provides dental services and products in Thailand. It provides dental diagnosis and general dentistry, oral surgery, dental implants, cosmetics dentistry, endodontic dentistry, periodontics dentistry, prosthodontic dentistry, and orthodontic dentistry services. As of December 31, 2019, the company operated 17 branches. Dental Corporation Public Company Limited was incorporated in 2008 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

EKH-R.BK.long_name: Ekachai Medical Care Public Company Limited
EKH-R.BK.summary: Ekachai Medical Care Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates Ekachai hospital in Thailand. It offers plastic surgery, fertility and genetic, pediatric, obstertrics and gynaecology, general medicine clinic, general surgery, orthopedics, ophthalmology, emergency, health promotion, hemodialysis, dental, physical, mobile checkup, pre-employment checkup, aesthetic and dermatology center, and child and teen development center services, as well as ambulatory care services for patients with injuries, functional limitations, disability, and diseases. Ekachai Medical Care Public Company Limited was incorporated in 2003 and is headquartered in Muang, Thailand.

EKH.BK.long_name: Ekachai Medical Care Public Company Limited
EKH.BK.summary: Ekachai Medical Care Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates Ekachai hospital in Thailand. IMH-R.BK.long_name: Intermedical Care and Lab Hospital Public Company Limited
IMH-R.BK.summary: Intermedical Care and Lab Hospital Public Company Limited operates occupational medicine hospital in Thailand. It also engages in the environmental analysis business. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

IMH.BK.long_name: Intermedical Care and Lab Hospital Public Company Limited

KDH-R.BK.long_name: Thonburi Medical Centre Public Company Limited
KDH-R.BK.summary: Thonburi Medical Centre Public Company Limited engages in the hospital business in Thailand. It provides services in the areas of hair and weight loss, aesthetic surgery, sexual health, and facial treatment. The company was formerly known as Krungdhon Hospital Public Company Limited and changed its name to Thonburi Medical Centre Public Company Limited in April 2013. Thonburi Medical Centre Public Company Limited was founded in 1996 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

LDC-R.BK.summary: LDC Dental Public Company Limited provides dental care services in Thailand. As of December 31, 2019, it operated a network of 30 branches. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Mueang Samut Prakan, Thailand.

LDC.BK.summary: LDC Dental Public Company Limited provides dental care services in Thailand. As of December 31, 2019, it operated a network of 30 branches. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Mueang Samut Prakan, Thailand.

LPH-R.BK.long_name: Ladprao General Hospital Public Company Limited
LPH-R.BK.summary: Ladprao General Hospital Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the hospital business in Thailand. It operates in two segments, Hospital, and Scientific Laboratory Testing & Research. The company operates Ladprao General Hospital, a private hospital with a capacity of 200 in-patient beds and with approximately 500 physicians in various fields. Its hospital provides services in the areas of internal medicine, pediatrics, women's health, ophthalmology, otolaryngology, general surgery, orthopedic surgery, cardiology and neurology, skin and beauty, dentistry and hemodialysis, etc. The company also offers scientific analytical and diagnostic, and research services for medical, agricultural, food and drug industries; agricultural plant protection product efficiency assessment services; testing and analysis services for pesticide residues and hazardous substances; and hospital management and consulting services. The company was founded in 1990 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

LPH.BK.long_name: Ladprao General Hospital Public Company Limited

The company was founded in 1990 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

M-CHAI-R.BK.summary: Mahachai Hospital Public Company Limited operates private hospitals under the Mahachai name in Thailand. It also trades in medical and other supplies. The company is founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Samut Sakhon, Thailand.

NEW-R.BK.summary: Wattana Karnpaet Public Company Limited engages in hospital and medical trading businesses in Thailand. It operates 100 beds private hospital under the North Eastern Wattana Hospital name. The company was founded in 1985 and is based in Udon Thani, Thailand.

NTV-R.BK.summary: Nonthavej Hospital Public Company Limited operates as a tertiary care private hospital in Thailand. The company provides medical services for inpatients and outpatients, as well as emergency cases with 24-hour ambulance service. It operates specialized medical centers and clinics that offer services in the areas of laparoscope surgery, breast cancer, children and teens, neurology, dental, diabetes, diagnostic digital imaging, emergency, gastrointestinal system and liver, general medicine, gynecologic cancer treatment, gynecologic laparoscopic surgery, gynecology, hemodialysis, ICU and CCU, minimally invasive surgery, nephrology, operations, orthopedics, physical medicine and rehabilitation, pregnancy, respiration, skin and cosmetic surgery, sleep, urinary tract, and wellness, as well as eye, ear, nose, and throat. The company also provides health checkup, ambulatory, and ward facility services. It has 208 beds for inpatients and 90 examination rooms for outpatients. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

PR9-R.BK.summary: Praram 9 Hospital Public Company Limited operates a hospital under the Praram 9 Hospital name in Thailand. The company offers a range of tertiary care services, including health promotion, preventive healthcare, diagnosis, treatment, and rehabilitation in the medical areas of obstetrics and gynecology, surgery, medicine, pediatrics, kidney transplant, cardiovascular, and orthopedist. As of December 31, 2019, it operated 166 licensed bed. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

RAM-R.BK.summary: Ramkhamhaeng Hospital Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates a private hospital that provides medical services in Thailand. The company operates through two segments, Hospital and Others. Its hospital includes 3 patient buildings with approximately 485 beds. The company also sells medical equipment and instruments. Ramkhamhaeng Hospital Public Company Limited was founded in 1988 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

RJH-R.BK.summary: Rajthanee Hospital Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides healthcare services in Thailand. The company offers health improvement, rehabilitation, and medical prevention services. It also provides medical services in areas, such as medicine, surgery and orthopedics, pediatrics, obstetrics and gynecology, otolaryngology, ophthalmology, anesthesiology, radiology, and dentistry. The company operates cardiology, emergency accident, orthopedic, hemodialysis, children's, health screening, dental, and radiology centers. As of December 31, 2019, it had 353 registered beds. Rajthanee Hospital Public Company Limited was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Phra Nakhon Si Ayutthaya, Thailand.

RPH-R.BK.summary: Ratchaphruek Hospital Public Company Limited engages in the hospital business under the Rachaphruek Hospital name in Thailand. The company provides medical services in the field of diabetes, bronchoscopy, pterygium surgery, gastroscopy, colonoscopy, tonsils and adenoids surgery, appendix surgery, and knee replacement. It also sells medicines and medical supplies. The company was formerly known as Sithan Karnpat Company Limited and changed its name to Ratchaphruek Hospital Public Company Limited in September 2016. Ratchaphruek Hospital Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1993 and is based in Khon Kaen, Thailand.

SKR-R.BK.summary: Sikarin Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates hospitals in Thailand. It is also involved in the management of rental spaces; and the sale of food and beverages. The company's hospitals comprise Sikarin Hospital with 355 beds in Bangkok; Rattarin Hospital with 100 beds in Muang; and Sikarin Hat-Yai Hospital with 350 beds in Hat Yai. Sikarin Public Company Limited was founded in 1979 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

SVH-R.BK.summary: Samitivej Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the hospital business in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through two segments, Hospital Operations and Other Businesses. It operates hospitals, adult centers, and child centers, as well as offers various programs and services for large corporations, embassies, and international schools. The company also provides asset management services for healthcare business; distributes health and cosmetics products; and operates a clinic. In addition, it engages in the restaurant, facility management, and investment businesses. The company was founded in 1979 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand. Samitivej Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Bangkok Dusit Medical Services Public Company Limited.

SVH.BK.summary: Samitivej Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the hospital business in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through two segments, Hospital Operations and Other Businesses. THG-R.BK.long_name: Thonburi Healthcare Group Public Company Limited
THG-R.BK.summary: Thonburi Healthcare Group Public Company Limited operates private hospitals in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: Medical Services Business, Healthcare Solution Provider, and Other Business. It offers services in various medical fields, including brain and neurology, bone and joint, gastro intestinal and liver, heart, and obstetrics and gynecology; and management services for provincial state hospitals, as well as for heart centers in the public and private sectors. The company also offers senior care and senior living, and home healthcare services; provides cleaning services, disinfecting and removal of dust mites; operates the patient rehabilitation center; conducts housing business for elderly; and operates care center and elderly carecenter, as well as distributes dental supplies brands, such as Adec, W&H, AO, Heraeus, Ivoclar, Megagen, SAM, Melag, and Alpro. It also sells pharmaceutical and medical goods in specialised stores; develops hospital management software; and develops land and property. The company operates three Bangkok-based hospitals, such as Thonburi, Thonburi2 and Thonburi Bamrungmuang hospitals; and four provincial hospitals, including Rajyindee, Ubonrak Thonburi, Sirivej Chanthaburi, and Thonburi Thungsong hospitals. Thonburi Healthcare Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

THG.BK.long_name: Thonburi Healthcare Group Public Company Limited

The company operates through three segments: Medical Services Business, Healthcare Solution Provider, and Other Business. It offers services in various medical fields, including brain and neurology, bone and joint, gastro intestinal and liver, heart, and obstetrics and gynecology; and management services for provincial state hospitals, as well as for heart centers in the public and private sectors. Thonburi Healthcare Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TNH-R.BK.long_name: Thai Nakarin Hospital Public Company Limited
TNH-R.BK.summary: Thai Nakarin Hospital Public Company Limited engages in the hospital business in Thailand. The company offers medical services in the areas of heart, bone and joint, holistic oncology, hemodialysis, skin and laser, traditional Chinese medicine, ear, nose, throat, pediatrics, obstetrics, gynecology, medicine, dental, surgery, emergency, physical therapy, gastrointestinal, breast care, lasik, diabetes, endocrinology, brain, neurology, hepato-biliary, pancreas, X-ray, and eye, as well as operates check-up centers. Thai Nakarin Hospital Public Company Limited was founded in 1993 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

TNH.BK.long_name: Thai Nakarin Hospital Public Company Limited
TNH.BK.summary: Thai Nakarin Hospital Public Company Limited engages in the hospital business in Thailand. The company offers medical services in the areas of heart, bone and joint, holistic oncology, hemodialysis, skin and laser, traditional Chinese medicine, ear, nose, throat, pediatrics, obstetrics, gynecology, medicine, dental, surgery, emergency, physical therapy, gastrointestinal, breast care, lasik, diabetes, endocrinology, brain, neurology, hepato-biliary, pancreas, X-ray, and eye, as well as operates check-up centers. Thai Nakarin Hospital Public Company Limited was founded in 1993 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

VIBHA-R.BK.long_name: Vibhavadi Medical Center Public Company Limited
VIBHA-R.BK.summary: Vibhavadi Medical Center Public Company Limited operates a hospital under the Vibhavadi Hospital name in Thailand. It operates through two segments, Hospital and Others. The company provides medical services; and room rental and hotel services. In addition, it engages in the beauty business. Vibhavadi Medical Center Public Company Limited was founded in 1986 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

VIBHA.BK.long_name: Vibhavadi Medical Center Public Company Limited
VIBHA.BK.summary: Vibhavadi Medical Center Public Company Limited operates a hospital under the Vibhavadi Hospital name in Thailand. It operates through two segments, Hospital and Others. The company provides medical services; and room rental and hotel services. In addition, it engages in the beauty business. Vibhavadi Medical Center Public Company Limited was founded in 1986 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

VIH-R.BK.summary: Srivichaivejvivat Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates hospitals in Thailand. Its medical services include treatment for the various heart disease, such as coronary artery bypass grafting, valvular repair/replacement, and congenital heart disease correction; various health check-up programs; services related to child development; various emergency services; and orthopedic service related to joint pain, hip pain, knee pain, trigger finger, hand pain, elbow or shoulder pain, etc. The company also provides treatment for cardiovascular disease, neurological and brain, allergy, cancer, respiratory diseases and lung, urinary tract and liver, sports injury, woman and occupational disease, digestive disease, and diabetes and endocrine, as well as blood, kidneys, and skin; and general radiography, fluoroscopy, computed tomography scanning services. In addition, it offers occupational therapy, elderly, and pediatric rehabilitation services, as well as rehabilitation services of patients with spinal cord injury, bone and joint, back pain, neck pain, shoulder pain, heart disease, cancer disease, and neuropathy; and services related to diagnosing bone and muscle abnormalities. Further, the company provides gastrointestinal, neurological, plastic, urology, orthopedics, laparoscopic, and cardiac surgery, as well as staple hemorrhoidectomy; treatment for ear, nose, and throat, such as otitis, sinusitis, etc.; hemodialysis procedure that cleans and filters the blood; dialysis services; anti-aging services; treatment for eye diseases; dermatological and dental services; medical treatment with traditional Chinese medicine; maternal and child care services. It also operates a vocational school. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Krathum Baen, Thailand.

WPH-R.BK.long_name: Wattanapat Hospital Trang Public Company Limited
WPH-R.BK.summary: Wattanapat Hospital Trang Public Company Limited owns and operates hospitals and clinics in Thailand. The company offers medical services in the field of medicine; hemodialysis; surgery; gynecology and delivery, and newborn; clinical pediatrics; skin and beauty; dental; physical therapy; dialysis; X-ray; MRI; wellness; and ophthalmology. It serves people through its 120 bed hospital. The company was founded in 1957 and is headquartered in Trang, Thailand.
